column4: Hi. I want to install the vim full version but the minimal version is installed. If I want to remove it with synaptic It will remove ubuntu-minimal which is ofcourse not what I want
i guess sudo apt-get remove ________ should work and why do you want to remove other version
because a minimal stripped down version is ofcourse inadequate for a text editor with a thousand bells and whistles :p
eg I load my config file and commands are not supported.
